mapper.select: select data from tb_platfrom_info where company_id= #{companyId} and platform_id = #{platformId}
select url,phone,card_no,id_card_no,password,tag,create_user,name,create_time from tb_portrait_input where create_user = #{query.createUser} order by create_time desc

SELECT tpi.url, CONCAT(LEFT(tpi.phone,3),'****',RIGHT(tpi.phone,4)) AS phone, tpi.card_no, CONCAT(LEFT(tpi.id_card_no,3),'***********',RIGHT(tpi.id_card_no,4)) AS idCardNo, tpi.password, tpi.tag, tpi.create_user, tpi.name, tpi.create_time, u.name AS createUserName FROM tb_portrait_input tpi LEFT JOIN `user` u ON tpi.create_user = u.id
AND tpi.create_user IN (SELECT pk_user_id FROM `user_org` WHERE pk_org_id = #{params.companyId})
AND tpi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.name},'%')
AND u.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{params.createUserName},'%')
ORDER BY tpi.create_time DESC
